author: rcm
msg: Tidied up startup and shutdown so any resources are dissociated, allowing for GC sooner.

author: rcm
msg: Lookups instances are now being sorted alphabetically.

author: rcm
msg: Modified test framework to return either an Object or a Collection when invoking methods.  Removed the overloading of the invoke methods so that the parameters parameter is required.

author: rcm
msg: Added an adapter for int primitives.
